mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservations r JOIN campground ON campground.camp_id = r.camp_id JOIN campdetail ON campdetail.campdetail_id = r.campdetail_id WHERE (check_in_date <= #{check_in_date} AND check_out_date >= #{check_out_date}) AND r.camp_id = #{camp_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (user_id, camp_id, campdetail_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, number_of_guest, total_price, status, created_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{camp_id}, #{campdetail_id}, #{check_in_date}, #{check_out_date}, #{number_of_guest}, #{total_price}, #{status}, NOW())
